snap(-20,0,20)

sky(180,191,209)
fog(150,206,237)
ground(12,100,248)
polys(100,100,255)

fadefrom(6000)
density(4)

name(Underwater Rush)
nlaps(6)

set(48,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,180)p
set(33,0,7600,0)pr
set(17,0,14000,-90)pt
chk(42,-1500,14000,-90)
set(15,-4500,14000,90)p
set(33,-4500,14000,90)
set(15,-10100,14000,90)p
set(17,-14600,14000,0)pt
chk(42,-14600,12500,180)
set(15,-14600,9500,0)p
set(33,-14600,3900,0)
set(15,-14600,3900,0)p
set(15,-14600,-1700,0)p
set(33,-14600,-3700,0)pr
set(24,-14600,-11200,180)
set(17,-14600,-14000,90)pt
chk(42,-13100,-14000,90)
set(15,-10100,-14000,90)p
set(15,-5600,-14000,90)p
set(35,-2800,-14000,90)pr
set(15,0,-14000,90)
fix(41,0,-14000,-1400,90)
set(35,2800,-14000,90)
set(15,5600,-14000,90)p
set(15,10100,-14000,90)p
set(17,14600,-14000,180)pt
chk(42,14600,-12500,0)
set(15,14600,-9500,0)p
set(33,14600,-3900,0)
set(15,14600,-3900,0)p
set(15,14600,1700,0)p
set(33,14600,3700,0)pr
set(24,14600,11200,0)
set(17,14600,14000,-90)pt
chk(42,13100,14000,-90)
set(15,10100,14000,90)p
set(33,8100,14000,90)pr
set(17,3500,14000,0)pt
chk(42,3500,12500,180)
set(15,3500,9500,0)p
set(33,3500,7500,0)pr
set(15,3500,0,0)p
chk(42,3500,-3000,180)
set(17,3500,-4500,180)pt
set(17,0,-4500,90)pt
chk(42,0,-3000,0)

set(17,-5550,10100,-90)
set(43,-5550,5600,0)
set(43,-5550,0,0)
set(43,-5550,-5600,0)
set(17,-5550,-10100,180)
set(17,-9050,-10100,90)
set(43,-9050,-5600,0)
set(43,-9050,0,0)
set(43,-9050,5600,0)
set(17,-9050,10100,0)

set(17,10800,10100,-90)
set(43,10800,5600,0)
set(43,10800,0,0)
set(43,10800,-5600,0)
set(17,10800,-10100,180)
set(17,7300,-10100,90)
set(43,7300,-5600,0)
set(43,7300,0,0)
set(43,7300,5600,0)
set(17,7300,10100,0)


maxb(7,-16000,-15000) 
maxt(7,16000,-15000) 
maxr(7,16000,-15000) 
maxl(7,-16000,-15000)
